name: Super Tube Diver
description:
Spent 3 weeks building a prototype during our 2nd semester of Game Design at Dawson College. You play as a man stuck in the 80s, reliving his glory days as a professional stuntman. Duck, dodge and dive your way through a physics based infinite-runner where you goal is to collect as many coins and stars as possible. Aim for the high score and share your best in the comments, good luck!

Controls (Keyboard)
UI
WASD/Arrows : Navigate menus
Enter: Confirm selection

In-Game
A/D: Rotate camera left/right respectively
Escape: Pause menu
Mouse: Movement of the character
Left-Click Mouse: Hold to dive/speed up

Controls (Gamepad)
UI
Left Stick: Navigate Menus
South Button: Confirm Selection

In-Game
Left Stick: Character movement
Right Stick: Camera rotation
Right Trigger: Hold to dive/speed up
Start: Pause menu
